extendedIngredients.name: fresh ginger
extendedIngredients.originalString: Dash fresh ginger, grated with a microplane or fine zester
metaInformation: with a microplane or fine zester

extendedIngredients.name: ginger
extendedIngredients.originalString: ¼ cup ginger, peeled and sliced

recipes.title: Ginger Lime Daiquiri
recipes.instructions: Make the ginger simple syrup: Add water, sugar and ginger to a pan over medium-high heat. Stir continually until sugar has dissolved, remove from heat. Allow the ginger to steep until syrup has cooled to room temperature, about 20 minutes. Strain out the ginger and store simple syrup in a plastic squeeze bottle or jar in the fridge until ready to use (can be made up to a week ahead of time).Make the Daiquiri: Add rum, lime juice and ginger simple syrup to a shaker full of ice. Shake gently for 15-30 seconds, strain into a cocktail glass. Grate fresh ginger into the glass.
